title: Tool Usage
description: Tool usage comprises the most common steps used in a site tool or utility, such as calculators, registrations, and requests for more information.

xdm:cancelled.title: Cancelled
xdm:cancelled.description: Captured when a visitor cancels out of a tool usage process.

xdm:complete.title: Complete
xdm:complete.description: Captured when a visitor successfully finishes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

xdm:failure.title: Failed
xdm:failure.description: Captured when a step in the tool usage process fails.

xdm:ID.title: ID
xdm:ID.description: Captures the ID of the tool process utilized, if applicable.  For example, this could be a claim, application, or booking ID, etc.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: Tracks the name of the tool in use.

xdm:saved.title: Saved
xdm:saved.description: Captured when a visitor saves and exits a tool usage process.

xdm:start.title: Start
xdm:start.description: Captured when a visitor initializes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

xdm:step.title: Step
xdm:step.description: Captured when any intermediary tool step is started on the site/app.

xdm:stepName.title: Step Name
xdm:stepName.description: Tracks the name of the tool step in use.

xdm:submitted.title: Submitted
xdm:submitted.description: Captured when a visitor submits data during a tool step.  Not necessarily synonymous with a successful event.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: Tracks the type or category of the tool in use.
